title: Spotify-Mcp
description: MCP server for integrating Claude with Spotify, enabling control over playback, search, and Spotify queue management.
creator: varunneal

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Spotify Developer Client ID, obtained from the Spotify Developer Dashboard.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Spotify Developer Client Secret, obtained from the Spotify Developer Dashboard.

SPOTIFY_REDIRECT_URI.description: The redirect URI specified during Spotify app creation, typically 'http://localhost:8888'.
